title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.2, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, enabling easy integration of local LLMs into Python apps.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, supporting Node.js and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama models, providing LLM, chat, and embeddings interfaces.

title: chainlit/chainlit-ollama
summary: Template to build a ChatGPT-like UI in Python backed by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-like web UI client for Ollama, supporting code highlighting, RAG, and multimodal chats.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java client library for Ollama, allowing Java/Kotlin/Scala apps to run local LLMs.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust client for Ollama with async support and typed model responses.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-like inline completions.

title: ollama-workflows
summary: GitHub Actions to pull, run, and test Ollama models in CI pipelines.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama, enabling local LLMs in retrieval-augmented generation pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-dify
summary: Dify plugin to register Ollama models as LLM providers for prompt orchestration and RAG.

title: ollama-curl
summary: Lightweight shell wrapper around curl for quick Ollama REST calls without installing clients.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: Cross-platform desktop UI (Tauri + React) for chatting with Ollama models offline.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLMs via Ollama for summarizing and brainstorming inside notes.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: n8n community node to integrate Ollama models into no-code automation workflows.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service template exposing Ollama endpoints with OpenAI-compatible chat completions.

title: ollama-telegram
summary: Telegram bot that forwards messages to a local Ollama model and streams replies back.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated list of community-tuned Ollama Modelfiles for CodeLlama, Llama3, Mistral, and more.
